shortDescription: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the export page (display_export.lib.php) in phpMyAdmin 2.11.x before 2.11.9.5 and 3.x before 3.1.3.1 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the pma_db_filename_template cookie.
vulnerabilityName: phpMyAdmin phpMyAdmin Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
